title: Trump orders blockade of sanctioned oil tankers entering and leaving Venezuela
description: Move against all sanctioned vessels comes amid escalating campaign against authoritarian leader Nicolás Maduro
content:
Donald Trump has ordered “a total and complete” blockade of all sanctioned oil tankers entering and leaving Venezuela, ramping up pressure on the country’s authoritarian leader Nicolás Maduro.
The move comes amid an escalating campaign by the Trump a... [4197 chars]

title: Ukraine war briefing: Peacekeepers could repel Russian forces under ceasefire plan, says Merz
description: German Chancellor says this remains a far-off prospect; Zelenskyy says negotiations on peace deal could soon be finalised. What we know on day 1,393
content: Under post-ceasefire guarantees provided by the United States and Europe to Ukraine, peacekeepers could in certain circumstances repel Russian forces, German Chancellor Friedrich Merz told ZDF public television in an interview, adding that this remai... [2990 chars]

title: Patients warned to expect disruption as doctor strike begins
description: British Medical Association members start 14th walkout of pay dispute in England at 07:00 on Wednesday.
content:
Patients are being told to expect disruption as doctors start their five-day strike in England, with NHS bosses saying they are struggling to keep as many services going as they have done in recent walkouts.
NHS England said with a wave of flu placin... [4622 chars]

title: Nicotine pouch rise is driven by young men, study finds
description: Around 7.5% of 16 to 24-year-old-men are using the small sachets that fit under the top lip, research suggests.
content:
Young men are behind the growing popularity of nicotine pouches in Great Britain, a study suggests.
Around 7.5% of 16 to 24-year-old-men are using the small sachets that fit under the top lip, compared with 1.9% use among young women and 1% among adu... [3090 chars]

title: Timothée Chalamet on Marty Supreme, his twenties and his love of Susan Boyle
description: The US actor is tipped for an Oscar nomination for his portrayal of table tennis star Marty Mauser.
content:
Hollywood star Timothée Chalamet is compiling his list of five Brits who he considers to be all-time greats.
"Lewis Hamilton, David and Victoria," he begins, referring to the seven-time Formula One champion and the Beckhams.
